channel.title: Runnin a server
channel.description:
[B]NOTICE[/B]: This is my first time trieng to run a server. I simply chose ZDR because it was my favorite rsps when I first joined rsps. Please no flame/troll.
Okay guys, well right now I'm getting very aggravated about this because as of now I still haven't figured out to run a server. I've followed these tutorials "http://www.google.com/forums/showthread.php?59-How-to-Create-Your-Very-Own-Private-Server" and "http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html" Once I've got them done, I downloaded the source+client of "innovation x" and "zdiddy reloaded" I keep getting errors and errors. Here they are.
If anyone would like the source that I downloaded I'll be happy to post up the link, plus it's virus free.
Here are the errors for the Zdiddy Reloaded file.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IHZuL.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/o9DYr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bDkaN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/T6CgH.png[/img]

item.title: Runnin a server
item.dc:creator: @FatMan223 FatMan223
item.description:
@FatMan223 wrote:

NOTICE: This is my first time trieng to run a server. I simply chose ZDR because it was my favorite rsps when I first joined rsps. Please no flame/troll.

Okay guys, well right now I’m getting very aggravated about this because as of now I still haven’t figured out to run a server.
